search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Octoparse (octoparse.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Octoparse can be found at: [https://www.octoparse.com/pricing](https://www.octoparse.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Pricing | Octoparse
===============

Enterprise Plan
---------------

Large Enterprise-ready

High-performance web scraping with prioritized support, designed for enterprise-level customers with diverse and large-scale data extraction needs.

Contact SalesContact Sales

Apply for Free Trial

All features in Professional, plus:

750+ tasks![Image 101: question](https://www.octoparse.com/static/pricing/question.svg)

40+ concurrent cloud processes ![Image 102: question](https://www.octoparse.com/static/pricing/question.svg)

Crawler Service

Start at

$399

Get crawlers built by us per your specific requirements with which you can run with Octoparse to retrieve the data you need at any time.

Request a quote

![Image 108](https://www.octoparse.com/_next/static/media/data-service.5e8f1daa.svg)

Data Service

Start at

$999

Simply relax and leave the data work to us. Our data team will meet with you to discuss your web crawling and data processing requirements.

Request a quote

![Image 109](https://www.octoparse.com/_next/static/media/startups-service.6a4c0ddd.svg)

Octoparse for Startups

Stay focused on finding product-market fit. Startups get Octoparse with a special 30% discount for a year.

Apply now

![Image 110](https://www.octoparse.com/_next/static/media/uni-service.ebed9dd0.svg)

Octoparse for Universities

Complete a student and educators application to claim a special discount on your Octoparse subscription.

Apply now
